page.title: 05New housing in Watchfield
page.content: The way to pick a site is not where the site is situated but how much the land will cost,and if it is available for building on.When building a house the contractors are not worried what type of surface they build on,concrete or grass.The reason they didÂ£nt use the larger area of the disused airfield is because it is going to be used for light industrial use but not for building.The houses are built for three types of people they are as follows: 1.The married couple with children. 2.The married couple with no children. 3.Old age pensioners. On the whole site 24 houses are planned to be built.So far out of the 24,6 of the houses have already been purchased. The area surrounding the building site is not being put to any further use.Plans for the old farmhouse are to restore it not demolish it.
